item.description: This restaurant is located in the Christmas Tree Shop Plaza, off exit 41. It has great Mexican food with many dishes under $10. A casual atmosphere, so jeans are fine. They have a good sized menu from soups, salads, endless enchiladas and tacos to combination dishes. Take a break from cooking and come share good conversation and food with a friendly group. Web site - www.ontheborder.com . If your a little late, just ask for the table in Annette's name with the PartyExpress group. In case of snow or icy conditions, this will be cancelled. Please check for updates in the morning and if you need me to call, just email me your phone number.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the table in Annette's name with the PartyExpress group.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: It's Mexican Night Out for Party Express
